```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("rest_inspec")

nycrest =
  rest_inspec %>%
  filter(critical_flag %in% c("Critical", "Not Critical")) %>%
  filter(boro == "MANHATTAN") %>%
  drop_na(score) %>%
  drop_na(grade) %>%
  filter(grade %in% c("A", "B", "C"))
  
  

  

unique(pull(rest_inspec, grade))
table(pull(rest_inspec, critical_flag))
table(pull(rest_inspec, boro))
table(pull(rest_inspec, grade))
```
